beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Whiskey Off-Road breaks you. 50 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 4
beats.narration: Mile 4. Copper Basin Climb. 3.8-mile opening climb sets the tone. Get in your pack here. singletrack bottleneck coming.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Classic Southwest MTB with singletrack, fire roads, and technical descents

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 12
beats.narration: Mile 12. Trail 48. Classic rocky singletrack with multiple water bars. Technical climbing where passing is nearly impossible.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Classic Southwest MTB with singletrack, fire roads, and technical descents

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 25
beats.narration: Mile 25. Skull Valley. The signature suffer-fest. 12 miles of exposed fire road with 2.5 thousand to 2.7 thousandft gain. Hot, relentless, cramping epidemic. This is where races are lost and legends are made.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Classic Southwest MTB with singletrack, fire roads, and technical descents

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 40
beats.narration: Mile 40. Cramp Hill. Just when you think you're recovering from Skull Valley. Another climb when your legs are toast.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Classic Southwest MTB with singletrack, fire roads, and technical descents

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 5: Mile 48
beats.narration: Mile 48. Trail 367 Boulder Drop. Technical descent with boulder sections. Hits when you're most depleted and least focused.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Classic Southwest MTB with singletrack, fire roads, and technical descents
